Korpi kehastanud noor näitleja Lars Söderdahl on kõige enam tuntud tänu Väikevenna rollile, keda ta kehastas ka Eesti videolevisse jõudnud Karlssoni-filmides. Film on digitaalselt restaureeritud.

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: EMO-s tuleb ette rohkem üllatavaid juhtumeid kui üheski teises haigla osakonnas. Täna on seal murtud sõrmega Erin. Peale selle saame teada, mis kehas söömise ajal toimub ja räägime ka viirustest.

programme.title: Beni ja Holly väike kuningriik
programme.desc: Daisy ja Poppy saavad endale tädi Ploomist tehtud nuku. Peagi on terve ilm neid nukke täis ja tädi Ploom on väga vihane.

programme.title: Oktonaudid
programme.desc: Kui Kvasi lemmik Gupi kaduma läheb, satuvad oktonaudid pruunvetikametsa, kohates oma teel imelikke ja naljakaid olevusi. Ka Gupi leitakse lõpuks üles.

programme.title: Nöps ja Mikk
programme.desc: Kui uneloits printsess Helgi unne suigutab ja kella lossitornist alla kukutab, peavad Nöps ning Mikk koos sõpradega leidma viisi, kuidas kell taas üles vinnata ja Helgi unest äratada.

programme.title: Priit ja Prääks
programme.desc: Üks jonnakas nõid tahab loitsida, et halloween’i õhtul päike ei loojuks. Priit peab teda veenma, et ta loitsu tühistaks ja halloweeni-pidustused ära ei jääks.

programme.title: Ernest ja Celestine
programme.desc: Ernest hakkab muusuemivalvuriks, kuid ootamatult saab temast ühe varastatud maali tõttu kahtlusalune.

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Sedakorda otsib Džungliässadelt abi lendoravapoiss Edward, kelle üle kõik ta sõbrad naeravad, sest ta kardab kõrgust. Gilbert ja Batricia võtavad nõuks ta lendama õpetada.

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Täna otsustab printsess kõigile abiks olla, aga selgub, et see polegi nii lihtne.

programme.title: Kroonitud peakesed
programme.desc: Tsaaritarid leiavad sulgpalli mängides nõiamoori luua ja neil tueb mõte luudadega lennates sulgpalli mängida.

programme.title: Hommiku-Hannes
programme.desc: Seekord saab Hannesest üks kuulus muinasjututegelane. Selline, kes alustab hommikut sõnaga mjäu.

programme.title: Saara ja part
programme.desc: Sallitädi koob valmis ühe lustliku mängu, aga mängureeglid tuleb Saaral ja Pardil välja nuputada.

programme.title: Lastekirjandusministeerium
programme.desc: Lastekirjandusministeeriumis töötavad minister Piip ja minister Tuut. Neil on oma kabinet Toompeal, mis meenutab veidi raamatukogu. Kahe peale on ka üks ministriportfell, mille sees on suur ja paks raamat väärtuslike salakoodidega. Nende abil leiavad Piip ja Tuut riiulist just õige raamatu, mida lugeda ning vaatajaile tutvustada. Igas raamatus on peidus ka üllatus, mis teeb lugemise põnevamaks ja avab ukse kirjaniku fantaasiamaailma. Seekord kohtume kirjanik Jaanus Vaiksooga, kes on kirjutanud põneviku “King nr 39”, raamatu illustreeris Katrin Kaev. Režissöör Kristo Veinberg, mängivad Haide Männamäe ja Toomas Tross.

programme.title: Miriami kodutu koer
programme.desc: Miriam ja pere meisterdab majaõue lumememme. Nende juurde tuleb kodutu koer, kes on lumememmest sisse võetud. Koer ei lahku, kuid õues on tal külm. Ta tuuakse tuppa ja ehitatakse talle isegi tore kuudike. Ainult kana ei mõista üldist rõõmu ja öösel elab ta üle kõige ärevamaid hetki. Hommikul ilmub välja koera peremees, ja selgub ka põhjus, miks koer lumememme nii omaks pidas. Lõpuks leebub ka kana.

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Miia ja Saara valmistavad õhtuks pastat. Miia püüab Saarat veenda, et Tsentoopia on päriselt olemas, ja laseb tal ruune puudutada. Tsentoopias pakuvad Gargoona ja Viks Drakonile meelelahutust ühe sinipingu näol, kelle nad on Poytheuselt ostnud. Sinipingu sõbrad aga tulevad haldjate juurde abi otsima, et oma kaaslane leida.

programme.title: 38 papagoid
38 popugajev
programme.desc: Kümneosalise nukufilmi lustakas lugu nelja sõbra - jutuka Pärdiku, tagasihoidliku Elevandipoja, ekstsentrilise Papagoi ja mõtliku Boa ettevõtmistest koduses džunglis, kus tihtilugu tuleb lahendada naljakaid paradokse, mis on seotud mitmetähenduslike sõnamängudega.

programme.title: Mängime arsti
programme.desc: "Mängime arsti!" on vahva ja hariv minisari 6-9-aastastele lastele, milles selgitatakse lihtsal ja näitlikul viisil enamlevinud haiguste olemust ning sümptomite avaldumisvorme.

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Tänases saates tutvume järgmiste ai-auhindade finalistidega. Võtame taas ette retke traumaosakonda ja Chris möllab laborites kaktustega!

programme.title: Rännud ehtsate maitsete maal
programme.desc: Pablo külastab Mokokchungi, saab osa sealsetest hõimupidustustest ja käib kohalikul suurel toiduturul.

programme.title: Putin - Vene spiooni lugu
programme.desc: Sarja teises osas jõuab Vladimir Putin Kremlisse tundmatu presidendina, keda Vene oligarhid loodavad oma kontrolli all hoida. Ajapikku haarab Putin järjest rohkem võimu enda kätte ja ümbritseb ennast KGB kolleegidega. Süvenetakse ka Boriss Berezovski ja ülejooksik Aleksander Litvinenko lugudesse - mõlemad sattusid Putiniga vastuollu ning leidsid surma Suurbritannia pinnal.

programme.title: 4x4. Türgi
programme.desc: Sarja kuuendas osas käime vaatamas kaunist merekindlust ja vallutame selle reisi kõrgema tipu – 3240 meetrit ning jääme sinna ööbima. Seejärel pakuvad mägiteed hulganisti huvitavat vaatamist ja silmailu ning lõpuks jõuame välja karjuste juurde, kes on lahkelt nõus meid endale külla kutsuma ja kostitama. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.

programme.title: Filmiklubi
programme.desc: Sissejuhatuse suurejoonelisele draamale "Howards End" teeb Margus Saar.

programme.title: Howards End
programme.desc: Inglise kirjaniku Edward Morgan Fosteri samanimelise romaani alusel valminud tundlik draama (režissöör James Ivory) võitis kolm Oscarit. Suurbritannia ühiskonnas olid 20. sajandi alguskümnenditel vanad klassisuhted veel tugevad, kuid tunda oli saabuvaid muudatusi. Haritud ja kunstihuviline Margaret Schlegel (Emma Thompson) ja ta õde Helen (Helena Bonham Carter) saavad sõpradeks kahe perekonnaga: konservatiivsete vaadetega töösturi Henry Wilcoxi (Anthony Hopkins) ja ta naise Ruthiga (Vanessa Redgrave) ning töölisklassi kuuluva mehe Leonard Basti (Samuel West) ja ta kaasa Jackiga (Niccola Duffet). Kolme perekonna lood põimuvad kokku, sest neid ühendavad kaotused ja ootamatud rõõmud. Puutumata ei jää ka Margaretile pärandatud maamõisa Howards Endi ajalugu.

programme.title: Maffiareetur
Il traditore
programme.desc: R: Marco Bellocchio. O: Pierfrancesco Favino, Maria Fernanda Cândido jt. Tõsielust ainest saanud krimidraama. 1980ndate algus Sitsiilias, maffia peab sisemist võimuvõitust heroiiniäri pärast. Maffiahierarhias küllaltki mõjukas Tommaso Buscetta tõmbub arveteklaarimisest tagasi ja pageb Brasiiliasse, oma lähedasi ta aga kaitsta ei suuda. Maffia on rünnanud Tommasot ja ta otsustab vastu rünnata. Temast saab Sitsiilia maffia ajaloos esimene mees, kes murrab Cosa Nostrale antud vaikimisvannet. Cannes'is Kuldse Palmioksa nominent, neli Euroopa filmiauhinna nominatsiooni.

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Väike printsess tähistab suurt lossipäeva ühe väga isevärki kunstiteose loomisega.

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Printsess otsib kedagi, keda õpetada, aga kõik tahavad hoopis talle õpetusi jagada.

programme.title: Beni ja Holly väike kuningriik
programme.desc: Vallatu Kusti saadetakse lemmikloomade kooli, kus preili Lõbu õpetab ta sõna kuulama.

programme.title: Tipsi ja Tim
programme.desc: Kaksikutel on tulemas sünnipäev, nad tahavad kõik sõbrad külla kutsuda ja enne seda kodu hästi kauniks ehtida.

programme.title: Hommiku-Hannes
programme.desc: Pole midagi, et Hannes on linnapoiss, täna õpib ta tundma lambakarjuse ametit.

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Miia ja Saara valmistavad õhtuks pastat. Miia püüab Saarat veenda, et Tsentoopia on päriselt olemas, ja laseb tal ruune puudutada. Tsentoopias pakuvad Gargoona ja Viks Drakonile meelelahutust ühe sinipingu näol, kelle nad on Poytheuselt ostnud. Sinipingu sõbrad aga tulevad haldjate juurde abi otsima, et oma kaaslane leida.

programme.title: Šokolaadipäev
Dzień czekolady
programme.desc: Monika kolib vanematega linnast maale, aga loodetud rahuliku paiga asemel on see hoopis täis maagiat. Monika leiab vana kappkella ja vaatamata keelule avab ta selle ukse ning satub otse võlumaailma.

programme.title: 38 papagoid
38 popugajev
programme.desc: Kümneosalise nukufilmi lustakas lugu nelja sõbra - jutuka Pärdiku, tagasihoidliku Elevandipoja, ekstsentrilise Papagoi ja mõtliku Boa ettevõtmistest koduses džunglis, kus tihtilugu tuleb lahendada naljakaid paradokse, mis on seotud mitmetähenduslike sõnamängudega.

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Tänases saates utvume järgmiste ai-auhindade finalistidega. Võtame taas ette retke traumaosakonda ja Chris möllab laborites kaktustega!

programme.title: Venemaa metsik loodus
programme.desc: Venemaa Kaug-Idas, Ohhoota mere ja Vaikse ookeani vahel asub Kamtšatka poolsaar. Siin leidub suitsevaid vulkaane, auravaid geisreid ja tundrast toitu otsivaid karusid. Kamtšatkal kõnnivad loomad kui noateral ja teevad kõik selleks, et karmile ilmale mitte alla vanduda. Kamtšatka ürgne loodus on säilinud tänu kõrvalisele asukohale maailma äärel.

programme.title: TeadusEST
programme.desc: Eestis tegeldakse isejuhtivate masinatega mitmel rindel ja autod ning isegi laevad pannakse end ise juhtima. Vähe sellest - ka metsa istutama võib varsti saata robotid! Eesti ettevõtete ja teadusasutuste erakordsete uuringute eesmärk on kõrvaldada lõplikult inimese põhjustatud liiklussurmad ja muuta ulme reaalsuseks. Saatejuht on Erle Loonurm, saatesari valmib koostöös Eesti Teadusagentuuriga.

programme.title: Jüri Arrak. Tagasivaatav mees
programme.desc: Kunstnike seas pole kuigi palju neid, kelle loomingu igaüks eksimatult ära tunneb. Jüri Arrak aga just ongi selline looja. Kes siis ei teaks tema looklevate vormidega salapäraseid peajalgseid, kes piltidel oma elu elavad! Seekord räägib loomingu asemel aga kunstnik ise. 85 eluaastat on ju päris hea vanus, et teada, mis on elus kõige tähtsam. Jüri Arrakut usutleb Owe Petersell. Režissöör Maire Radsin, toimetaja Anne-Mari Müller, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske.

programme.title: Kommentaare Eesti filmile
programme.desc: Filmi valmimist meenutavad režissöör Kalju Komissarov, operaator Harry Rehe, helirežissöör Enn Säde, Manni osatäitja Luule Komissarov ja kunstnik Jüri Arrak.

programme.title: Metskapten
programme.desc: Legendaarne kapten Kihnu Jõnn valib oma laevale meeskonda, et minna Riiast Santosesse. Suurepärase inimesetundjana oskab ta kõrtsis märgata ka kaltsupuntra taga tõelist meest. Kaptenipaberiteta Jõnn suudab keset merd tuulevaikuses seistes januse ja näljase meeskonna oma tahtele allutada ning tema elutarkus ja tahe viivad laeva "Fortuuna" sihile raskete olude kiuste. Režissöör Kalju Komissarovi film toetub Juhan Smuuli tollal menukale näidendile. Jüri Järveti mängitud peategelane alustab ühe filmikriitiku sõnul sealt, kus näitleja kuningas Leariga pooleli jäi. Vastandlike taotlustega film on tervikuna teinud Jõnnist realistlikuma tegelase kui Smuul silmas pidas. Osades Luule Paljasmaa, Katrin Karisma, Enn Klooren, Heino Mandri jt.

programme.title: Tähelaev
programme.desc: Jüri Arraku käekiri on tuttav pea kõigile eestlastele. Tema väliselt püsiv laad on vormiotsingute asemel seotud kunsti ülima vaimsusega. Hea suhtleja ja ekspressiivse maalijana on Arrakus mõõde, mida meie kultuuripildis ootamatult väheseks on jäänud - hinge avatus maailmale ning sisim siirus elu mõtte taotlemisel. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma.

programme.title: Suur Tõll
programme.desc: Eesti vägilase Suure Tõllu võitlusest võõrvallutajatega. Režissöör Rein Raamat.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley Indias
programme.desc: Joanna Lumley imeline 8000 kilomeetri pikkune reis lõppeb tema sünnikohas Srinagaris Kashmiri osariigis. Dharamsalas kohtub ta dalai-laamaga.

programme.title: Elias ja sügaviku saladus
Elias og Storegaps Hemmelighet
programme.desc: Pärast laeva päästmist tormisel merel saab päästepaat Elias endale kangelase kuulsuse. Ta tulevik näib helge, kuna talle tehakse tööpakkumine suurest sadamast. Elias võtab väljakutse vastu, kuigi see tähendab oma sõpradest eemaldumist. Peagi avastab ta, et suures sadamas toimub õhtuhämaruses midagi kahtlast. Päästepaat Elias ei saa sündmusi niisama kõrvalt vaadata ja võtab vastu otsuse kurjategijad peatada. Peagi mõistab ta, et selleks läheb tal vaja oma vanade sõprade abi. Filmi režissöörid Simen Alsvik, Will Ashurst.

programme.title: Lehm Liselotte
programme.desc: Liselotte võtab täna pähe koos teiste loomadega telgis ööbida.

programme.title: Buratino tegutseb jälle
61. Muistsed eestlased III Rocca al Mare
programme.desc: Lugu sellest, et ennemuistsel aal elasid eestlased koduloomadega ühes majas, nende äratuskellaks oli kukk ja varanatukese krabas kokku kratt. Taluperemehe juures käivad Buratino, Malvina ja Artemon, kaasa teeb vanaajamees Hanno Talving.

programme.title: Lastekirjandusministeerium
programme.desc: Lastekirjandusministeeriumis töötavad minister Piip ja minister Tuut. Neil on oma kabinet Toompeal, mis meenutab veidi raamatukogu. Kahe peale on ka üks ministriportfell, mille sees on suur ja paks raamat väärtuslike salakoodidega. Nende abil leiavad Piip ja Tuut riiulist just õige raamatu, mida lugeda ning vaatajaile tutvustada. Igas raamatus on peidus ka üllatus, mis teeb lugemise põnevamaks ja avab ukse kirjaniku fantaasiamaailma. Seekord kohtume kirjanik Jaanus Vaiksooga, kes on kirjutanud põneviku “King nr 39”, raamatu illustreeris Katrin Kaev. Režissöör Kristo Veinberg, mängivad Haide Männamäe ja Toomas Tross.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Suur lumetorm paneb kõik elava proovile. Sue Aikens katkestab end Kavikis peaaegu ära, et hoida lennurada puhtana. Ricko DeWilde kasutab juhust ja õpetab pojale, kuidas lumetormis ellu jääda. Jessie Holmes hangib talvevarusid. Eagle'is tegutseb Denise Becker Andy Bassich’i juhtimise järgi.

programme.title: Viis koostisosa – Jamie kiired ja lihtsad road
programme.desc: Jamie käe all valmivad seekord aasiapärased praemunad, suitsune tursk pancetta’ga, oivaliselt krõbe küüslaugukana ja hõrk riisipuding mangoga.

programme.title: Loomade salaelu
programme.desc: 50aastasel ämmalahv Maryl on elu jooksul sündinud 19 poega ja töötajad kardavad, et järgmine tiinus on loomale ohtlik. Rühma tuuakse uus noor emane Popoyan ja loodetakse, et Mary senisel partneril tekib temaga suhe. Ent Popoyan osutub tõeliseks romantikuks. Hiidsaarmas Icana on Chesteri juhtemane. Teda loodetakse paaritada uustulnuk Diegoga, ent traagiline sündmus muudab peresuhteid. Laiskloomad Tina ja Rico magavad üheskoos 18 tundi päevas, kuid viimase kolme aasta jooksul on Tina kõik Rico ärkveloldud tunnid põrguks muutnud. Töötajad saadavad kolmejalgse kameeleoni kiirkohtingule. Kelle ta valib? Või saavad kõik esimesel korral korvi?

programme.title: 4x4. Türgi
programme.desc: Sarja seitsmendas osas algab suur lõimumine ja kohalike oludega tutvumine. Piilume karjuseelu telgitagustesse ja naudime külalislahkust. Seejärel sõidame Kayseri nimelisse linna ja vaatame ringi kohalikul hiigelsuurel turul. Siis jõuame aga imeilusasse Kapadookiasse. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.

programme.title: Ema
programme.desc: Cathy plaanib grillipidu. Michael ei vasta tema e-kirjaga saadetud kutsele ja Cathy tahab teada põhjust.

programme.title: Suurte heliloojate klassikalised paigad
programme.desc: Viin, London, Pariis, Itaalia linnad - kuhu kõikjale imelaps Mozart ei sattunud, kui isa talutas teda Euroopa õukondadesse klaverit ja viiulit mängima. See kõik tõi kuulsust, kuid mitte raha. Kümme viimast aastat veetis ta tollase muusikaelu Mekas Viinis, kus ta ka vaesuses suri. Kõige enam aga hindas Mozarti geniaalsust Praha.

programme.title: Me armastame Mozartit
We love Mozart
programme.desc: Ljubljana festivalil 2020 toimunud vabaõhukontsert on pühendatud Mozarti aegumatule loomingule. Kontserdil kõlavad avamäng ooperile „Figaro pulm“, flöödikontsert nr 2, Sinfonia concertante K. 364 seatuna klarnetile, flöödile ja orkestrile ning 41. sümfoonia „Jupiter“. Kontserti juhatab Sloveenia dirigent ja klarnetimängija Mate Bekavac, flöödisolistina astub üles Irena Grafenauer.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Printsess ihkab endale väikest õde, kellega mängida ja saladusi jagada.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Kellelgi pole mahti printsessi jaoks ja ta peab plaani, kuidas lossirahvast mängima meelitada.(n)

programme.title: Beni ja Holly väike kuningriik
programme.desc: Kuna maavaimude päästetiimil on nii palju tööd, tuleb laste päästetiimilt abi paluda.(n)

programme.title: Tipsi ja Tim
programme.desc: Kaksikutele tuleb külla härra Rosen, kes istub ratastoolis. Sellele vaatamata saab ta mängida ja peab ka trenni tegema.(n)

programme.title: Hommiku-Hannes
programme.desc: Hannese päev möödub ühe vanakreeka kangelase nahas ja tal tuleb paraku tegemist teha ka ühe koletisega.(n)

programme.title: Kolm sõpra Prostokvašinost
Troe iz Prostokvažino
programme.desc: Eduard Uspenski raamatu „Onu Fjodor, kass ja koer“ ja tema originaalkäsikirjade ainetel vändatud Prostokvašino multifilmisarja esimene lugu aastast 1978. Pisut tõsimeelne linnapoiss hüüdnimega Onu Fjodor kolib koos kõuts Matroskiniga maale, Prostokvašinosse ja saab sõbraks kohaliku krantsi Šarikuga. Külakese kombeid ja eluolu aitab mõista postiljon Petškin. Tallinnfilmile tõlkinud Valeeria Villandi, režissöör Eugen Rozental, näitlejad Reet Rootare, Rita Raave, Ellu Puudist, Jüri Krujokv, Tõnu Mikiver, Hans Kaldoja, Olaf Paesüld ja Ain Jürisson.(n)

programme.title: Elias ja sügaviku saladus
Elias og Storegaps Hemmelighet
programme.desc: Pärast laeva päästmist tormisel merel saab päästepaat Elias endale kangelase kuulsuse. Ta tulevik näib helge, kuna talle tehakse tööpakkumine suurest sadamast. Elias võtab väljakutse vastu, kuigi see tähendab oma sõpradest eemaldumist. Peagi avastab ta, et suures sadamas toimub õhtuhämaruses midagi kahtlast. Päästepaat Elias ei saa sündmusi niisama kõrvalt vaadata ja võtab vastu otsuse kurjategijad peatada. Peagi mõistab ta, et selleks läheb tal vaja oma vanade sõprade abi. Filmi režissöörid Simen Alsvik, Will Ashurst.(n)

programme.title: Lehm Liselotte
programme.desc: Kõigepealt kaovad linnapea prillid, siis postiljoni prillid...(n)

programme.title: Koolitants 2021
programme.desc: Noorte tantsijate oodatuim festival on Tallinnas Vene Kultuurikeskusesse toonud kokku noored andekad tantsijad üle kogu Eesti. Toome vaatajani valiku tantsudest, tantsurahva emotsioonid ja juhendajate intervjuud. Saatejuht Inger, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske.(n)

programme.title: Ületamatu loomariik
programme.desc: Terve igavik katsetamist olelusvõitluses teiste loomade, loodusjõudude ja isegi inimeste vastu on loonud kõige hämmastavamaid olendeid, kelle oskused jätavad inimese võimed kaugele maha. Esimeses osas tuleb vaatluse alla mõne loomaliigi imeline taastumis- ja tervenemisvõime, mis ei tule inimeste puhul kõne allagi.(n)

programme.title: Kaduva maailma lävel
programme.desc: Atlandi lõhe on siirdekala, kes elab Eestis umbes 16 jões. Kogu Euroopas on viimase viiekümne aastaga siirdekalade arvukus langenud ligikaudu 93 protsenti. Lõhe vajab suuremat jõge, mis on takistamatult merega ühenduses ja selle jõe kärestikke, kus paljuneda ning vaba ligipääsu neile kärestikele. Enamikul meie tähtsatest lõhejõgedest eksisteerivad inimese poolt ehitatud paisud, mis on lisaks lõhele takistuseks ka teistele siirdekaladele ja jõeelustikule. Vasalemma jõgi on kõigest üks kolmest paigast Eestis, kus on looduslik lõhepopulatsioon. Eestimaa looduse fondi magevee-elustiku ekspert Jürgen Karvak käib juba kümme aastat Vasalemma jõel snorgeldamas, pildistamas ja uurib sealsete kalade elu. Jürgen räägib, miks on lõhedel vaja looduslikke elupaiku.(n)

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: Oktoober on vaimse tervise kuu. Kuidas olla kohal kannatuses ja kas on võimalik muuta valu iluks? "Plekktrummil" on külas psühholoog ja koorijuht Urve Uusberg. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma.(n)

programme.title: Suurte heliloojate klassikalised paigad
programme.desc: Viin, London, Pariis, Itaalia linnad - kuhu kõikjale imelaps Mozart ei sattunud, kui isa talutas teda Euroopa õukondadesse klaverit ja viiulit mängima. See kõik tõi kuulsust, kuid mitte raha. Kümme viimast aastat veetis ta tollase muusikaelu Mekas Viinis, kus ta ka vaesuses suri. Kõige enam aga hindas Mozarti geniaalsust Praha.(n)

programme.title: Loomade salaelu
programme.desc: 50aastasel ämmalahv Maryl on elu jooksul sündinud 19 poega ja töötajad kardavad, et järgmine tiinus on loomale ohtlik. Rühma tuuakse uus noor emane Popoyan ja loodetakse, et Mary senisel partneril tekib temaga suhe. Ent Popoyan osutub tõeliseks romantikuks. Hiidsaarmas Icana on Chesteri juhtemane. Teda loodetakse paaritada uustulnuk Diegoga, ent traagiline sündmus muudab peresuhteid. Laiskloomad Tina ja Rico magavad üheskoos 18 tundi päevas, kuid viimase kolme aasta jooksul on Tina kõik Rico ärkveloldud tunnid põrguks muutnud. Töötajad saadavad kolmejalgse kameeleoni kiirkohtingule. Kelle ta valib? Või saavad kõik esimesel korral korvi?(n)

programme.title: Lapsed suures spordis
Varicella
programme.desc: Dokumentaalfilmide sari lastest, kes näevad ränka vaeva, et tippspordis läbi lüüa ja samal ajal ka igapäevaelu tegemistega toime tulla. Andekad õed, 13-aastane Nastja ja 7-aastane Polina õpivad prestiižses Vene balletiakadeemias, kuhu igal aastal pürgivad tuhanded lapsed. Tunnustatud dokumentalist Viktor Kossakovski laseb vaatajail heita pilgu õekeste omavahelistele soojadele ja usalduslikele suhetele. Tüdrukud unistavad balletisolistiks saamisest ja harjutavad selle nimel kuus tundi päevas.(n)

programme.title: Jalgpalli Premium Liiga
programme.sub-title: Nõmme Kalju FC – Tallinna FCI Levadia
programme.desc: Jalgpalli Premium Liiga jätkub põhimõtteliste mängudega - lahtine on nii tiitli saatus kui ka ülejäänud medalikohad. Põnevus tõotab püsida kuni lõpuvoorudeni ja libastuda ei taha ükski meeskond.(n)

programme.title: Maagilised kangelased
Die Wolf-Gäng
programme.desc: Vampiir, kes ei talu verd silmaotsaski; haldjas, kes kardab lennata ja libahunt, kellel on loomakarvade allergia – teismelised Vlad, Faye ning Wolf on seetõttu maailmakuulsa nõiakooli, Penneri Akadeemia, naerualused. Kuid kolmik hoiab kokku ja nimetab end Wolfi Kambaks, et koos paljastada salajane vandenõu, mida hauvad linnapea ning tema sekretär, mis tähendaks lõppu Crailsfeldeni linnale ja selle haldjatest, nõidadest, trollidest, kääbustest ning vampiiridest elanikkonnale. Fantastilises seikluses teevad kaasa tipp-koomikud Rick Kavanian ja Axel Stein. Saksamaa ühe edukama fantastika- ja ulmekirjaniku Wolfgang Hohlbeini raamatu filmiversioon.(n)

programme.title: Prügihunt ja Superjänes
programme.desc: Lustlik keskkonnasõbralik nukuseriaal kahe peakangelase Superjänese ja Prügihundi eestvedamisel. Kui vaatad seda sarja, tunned metsas looduse ära! Loo kirjutas Wimberg, lavastas Vahur Keller, kunstnik Britt Urbla Keller, helilooja Tauno Aints. Kõikide nukkudega mängivad Tiina Tõnis, Mirko Rajas, Laura Nõlvak, Mihkel Tikerpalu ja Evgeny Moiseenko. Režissöör-lavastaja Salme-Riine Uibo, produtsent Margus Saar.(n)

programme.title: Koolitants 2021
programme.desc: Noorte tantsijate oodatuim festival on Tallinnas Vene Kultuurikeskusesse toonud kokku noored andekad tantsijad üle kogu Eesti. Toome vaatajani valiku tantsudest, tantsurahva emotsioonid ja juhendajate intervjuud. Saatejuht Inger, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske.(n)

programme.title: Juubelijuttu Margarita Voitesega
programme.desc: Lauljanna loometööd tutvustav saade. Vestlust juhib raadioajakirjanik Vello Mikk, sõna sekka ütleb juubilari klassiõde Mai Kolossova. Saade valmis Margarita Voitese 50. sünnipäevaks. Režissöör Toomas Lasmann, toimetaja Eeva Potter.(n)

programme.title: Laulab Margarita Voites
programme.desc: Margarita Voites esitab Violetta aaria Verdi ooperist "Traviata", Aleksandr Aljabjevi "Ööbik" ja Leo Delibes "Bolero". Filmitud Kadrioru lossis.(n)

programme.title: Lucia
programme.desc: Lucia aaria G. Donizetti ooperist "Lucia de Lammermoor" esitab Margarita Voites.(n)

programme.title: Laulab NSVL rahvakunstnik Margarita Voites
programme.desc: Margarita Voites stseenides ooperitest G. Donzetti "Lucia de Lammermoor", E. Tambergi "Cyrano de Bergerac" jt, partneriteks Urve Tauts ning Teo Maiste. Lavapartnerid kõnelevad teatri elust ja võlust, ühisest loometööst. Kammerkontserdil esitab Margarita Voites soololaulu, flöödil Sigrid Orusaar, klaveril Therese Raide. Küsitles Enn Eesmaa.(n)

programme.title: Laulab Margarita Voites
programme.desc: Margarita Voites esitab valiku oma repertuaari paremikust. Klaveril Aino Himbek.(n)

programme.title: Tähelaev
programme.desc: Tema särav hääl on kuulajaid rõõmustanud ja võlunud juba enam kui pool sajandit. Unustamatud rollid Estonia ja Vanemuise lavadel on Margarita Voitese nime kirjutanud Eesti muusika primadonnade leheküljele. Saatejuht Urmas Vaino, režissöör Kalev Lepik.(n)

programme.title: Teatridirektor
programme.desc: W. A. Mozarti lühiooper "Teatridirektor" esietendus 1981. aastal Estonias, peaosades Anu Kaal ja Margarita Voites. Ooperi võtmepunktiks on kahe daami - preili Silberklangi ja proua Herzi - äge duell primadonna koha pärast. Filmis esitab reporter Enn Eesmaa intrigeerivaid küsimusi mõlemale Estonia primadonnale. Kaastegevad Hans Miilberg ja Tiit Tralla, lisaks Katrin Karisma, Helgi Sallo, Sirje Puura, Karl Kalkun, Arvo Laid. Teatri orkestrit dirigeeris Vello Pähn. Režissöör Mati Põldre.(n)

programme.title: CHIPS
programme.desc: Frank Poncherello, an undercover federal agent and Jon Baker, a rookie join the highway patrol in California but for entirely different reasons. They team up and roam around putting a stop to speeding cars and vehicle thefts, helping those who are lost and sometimes in investigating crimes.

programme.title: Eragon
programme.desc: A simple farm boy discovers that he is the subject of an ancient prophecy when he stumbles upon a dragon egg. Becoming a dragon rider, he must fight against the tyrannical king Galbatorix who has betrayed his fellow dragon riders and his people in a quest for power.

programme.title: The Cold Light of Day
programme.desc: Will decides to travel to Spain to meet his family for a vacation, but discovers that all his family has been kidnapped. On his quest to find them, facts start to appear, and Will discovers that his father works for an international spying organization.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Princess Diana, Princess of the Amazon, was trained at Paradise Island to become an invincible warrior. When an American pilot lands on her island and tells her about the outside world, she decides to leave her home in the hope of seeing new cultures and meeting other warriors from Greece. She becomes Wonder Woman and tries to stop ongoing wars while testing her superpowers.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: As the last son of Krypton sent to Earth, a young journalist raised by his adoptive parents finds the fate of planet Earth in his hands after an attack. From the writer of "The Dark Knight," director of "300," and producer Christopher Nolan comes this epic Superman reboot.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Tuck and Frank (Tom Hardy and Chris Pine) are two best friends and CIA agents. They fall in love with the same girl, Lauren (Reese Witherspoon). She's confused between both of them. Both men agree to let her choose. But they just can't stop using their skills to keep tabs on her.

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Milo just came out of a divorce, working as a bounty hunter , he gets a promise of a reward for the arrest of his ex-wife, which changes the course of his life.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Mitch Buchannon, a devoted life guard who butts heads with a new recruit, as they uncover a crime that could threaten the future of the bay.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: Sean Anderson goes off on a journey with his stepfather to find his grandfather, who is missing on a mythical island. They set out for the island of Palau where they meet a man and his daughter. Their helicopter crashes on the mysterious island. Sean finds his grandfather and adventure begins.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens misinterpret video-feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth using the games as models for their various assaults. The president decides to seek help from an old friend, who had also been romantically involved with his wife in the past, and who happens to be a former 1980s video game champion, by assigning him to lead a team of old-school arcaders to defeat the aliens.

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In the near future, Wade Watts, an outcast young man tries to escape his daily horror by joining an online game called Oasis. When the game’s billionaire founder dies, his fortune is offered to the players as a prize for achieving a certain level in the game. Five years after joining the game, Watts finds himself facing off against corporate foes in both real life and in the game.

programme.title: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
programme.desc: Based on the comic book series (Valerian and Laureline), Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets revolves around Valerian (Dane Dettan) and Laureline (Cara Delevingne), a team of special operatives who time travel on a mission to find and explore the galaxy's empire.

programme.title: John Carter
programme.desc: John Carter manages to escape prison in Virginia and hide in a cave, where he finds a magic locket that takes him to another planet. There, he comes in contact with green, tall, creatures who ask for his help to defeat their own enemies.

programme.title: This Means War

programme.title: My Mom's New Boyfriend
programme.desc: Young FBI agent Henry Durand finds himself assigned to a tough task when he has to monitor his mother's boyfriend, who is an international art thief posing as a consultant.

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
programme.desc: Two con men try to resolve the rivalry between them through a bet, by picking a young girl who inherited fifty thousand dollars to be their target. Whoever deceives her and takes the money first, is the winner.

A highly intelligent student wants to enroll in Harvard, but doesn't have the tuition fees. He moves with his friends to Las Vegas, where they us their card counting skills to win large amounts of cash in the casinos of the city.

programme.title: Molly's Game
programme.desc: Molly Bloom (Jessica Chastain), a beautiful young Olympic-class skier with striking charisma, ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game for a decade before being arrested in the middle of the night by 17 armed FBI agents.

programme.title: Mississippi Grind
programme.desc: Believing that his bad luck is the thing standing between him and his dreams, Gerry soon finds a companion in Curtis, a poker player whom Gerry believes is luckier than he is. Together, they team up and set out on a journey to New Orleans for a high-stakes poker game.

programme.title: The Call
programme.desc: When a veteran 911 operator, Jordan (Halle Berry), takes a life-changing call from a teenage girl who has just been abducted, she realizes she must face a killer from her past to save the girl's life.

programme.desc: DC policeman Cale (Channing Tatum) is on a White House tour with his daughter when it is attacked by heavily armed paramilitary invaders. He must save his daughter and the President of the United States, though the odds are stacked against him.(n)

programme.title: 12 Strong
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film tells the story of a Special Forces team that was sent to Afghanistan right after the 9/11 attacks. Deep into enemy territory, the team faces unfavorable odds and make uneasy alliances as they try to take down the Taliban.(n)

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: Former presidential guard Mike Banning must step up when he finds himself in the White House in the midst of a terrorist attack. Only Banning has the inside knowledge national security forces will need to rescue the President from his kidnappers, and avert an even greater disaster.(n)

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: Following the mysterious death of the British Prime Minister, Secret Agent Mike Banning does all he can to stop the planned attack, targeting to assassinate all western world leaders attending the funeral.(n)

programme.title: American Assassin
programme.desc: Before hunting down terrorists, Mitch Rapp was an innocent college student and a talented athlete. But after an unexpected set of events, Mitch joins the CIA and is trained to the highest level, thus giving him the ability to fight the deadliest and most dangerous people.(n)

programme.title: Draft Day
programme.desc: The General Manager of the Cleveland Browns struggles to acquire the number one draft pick for his team.

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Rupert Pupkin is an unsuccessful, aspiring comedian who finds an unusual way to get his moment in the he kidnaps his favorite talk show host to force him to give Punkin a chance to display his talent on his show.

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: Former CIA operative Peter Devereaux (Pierce Brosnan) returns to work in order to take on a very personal mission. He soon finds himself in the midst of a fierce battle with a former pupil in a scenario involving senior officers in the agency and related to the Russian presidential election.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is the under-achieving son of an LA media magnate. The unanticipated death of his father kick-starts his life as he decides to use resources inherited from his father to fight city crime. In his efforts to fight crime Reid recruits the help of his father’s mechanic and a criminologist. Disputes threaten the crime-fighting trio before they have a chance to make a difference.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Brian O'Conner teams up with his ex-con friend Roman Pearce and undercover U.S. Customs Service agent Monica Fuentes to bring down Miami's drug lord Carter Verone.

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: Cameron (Mark Ruffalo) is a depressed father who is addicted to alcohol, trying in various ways to regain his wife Maggie (Zoe Saldana) by taking full responsibility of his young daughters. In his attempt to deal with them, participate in their daily life, and do some chores, the girls do not make this task easy for the father.

The film follows the life of baseball player Jackie Robinson, and how he wrote down history as the first African-American to play in Major League,playing with the Brooklyn Dodger under the management of Branch Rickey.

programme.title: Automata
programme.desc: In a world ravaged by natural disasters and climate change, mankind faces one more threat in the form of robots violating their protocols against altering themselves, which could spell disaster for the survival of mankind as machines evolve beyond what they were meant for.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In a world devastated by a global war, except for Western Europe (UFB) and Australia (the Colony), Douglas Quaid believes he is a factory worker until he discovers real memories of being a high-profile agent at UFB after visiting Rekall, a recreational company that implants false memories. A series of chases and clues reveal the plan to eliminate the Colony and only Quaid can "kill" the plan.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: Set in a dystopian future where crime rates have become insanely high, evil corporation Omni Consumer Products tries to create a prototype that is half-robot and half-human. When RoboCop learns about their intrigues, he turns on his masters.

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Over the course of 24 hours, the film follows a group of employees in an investment bank, and the first hours where they discover the truth about the financial crisis of 2008.(c)

programme.title: Casino Jack
programme.desc: This upcoming title is a film about the career of Washington lobbyist and convicted con man Jack Abramoff. In an investigation following a corruption scandal, Jack Abramoff was convicted of several charges including fraud and tax evasion. Several other Washington lobbyists and politicians were also convicted. The film stars Kevin Spacey as Jack Abramoff and Kelly Preston as Jack’s wife Pam.(c)

programme.desc: Princess Fiona has been turned into an ogre and she and Shrek are married. They head out to meet Fiona's parents, the King and Queen, after a long time away. programme.desc: Danny Ocean is training his gang to prepare for a third robbery, after the casino owner Willie Bank betrays their friend Reuben Tishkoff.

Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four mutant turtle brothers fight crimes and go on dangerous adventures. But their latest adventure has them tapping into something mysterious.

programme.desc: SpongeBob returns for more underwater adventures, driven along by his curiosity and his attempt to discover everything new in his world.

programme.title: Get Carter
programme.desc: Jack Carter, who left his home in Seattle years ago and moved to Las Vegas, returned to the funeral of his brother Richard after his death in a road accident during a storm. He suspects that he was killed and is after the killers.

programme.title: Judge Dredd
programme.desc: In the year 2139, the Earth became uninhabitable and the increasing crime rates created a new justice system where Judges act as police, jury and executioners. Judge Joseph Dredd finds himself a fugitive after being sentenced to life in prison for murder.

programme.title: Transformers : Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The Autobots and Decepticons discover a space ship on the moon that contains secrets that can lead to war of the worlds. Events unfold as both sides attempt to capture the space ship.

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and his crew find themselves on the wrong side of the law once again as they plan a heist to buy their freedom while being watched by a ruthless drug lord and a relentless federal agent.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Federal agent Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) enlists the aid of Dom (Vin Diesel) and his crew to bring a criminal mastermind Shaw (Luke Evans) and his gang to justice. In exchange for full pardons, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: Sixty-five million years ago, an alien race, the "Creators", implanted an alloy, "Transformium", into the Earth. It is now excavated, along with the melted bodies of illegally hunted Autobots and Decepticons, by KSI industries to build transformer drones, like Galvatron. Optimus Prime, long in hiding from this hunt, emerges to defend his friends and face Galvatron who turns out to be an old enemy.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: As Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker are sent to help Palpatine against Count Dooku, Anakin turns more to the Force as he struggles against visions of the death of his beloved wife Padmé, until he is lured to the dark side and Darth Vader is born.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A seventh installment to the series, with events taking place thirty years after the Battle of Endor and the events portrayed in Return of the Jedi.

programme.title: Furious Seven
programme.desc: Following Owen Shaw and his team, Dominic (Van Diesel), Brian (Paul Walker) and their team can return to the United States and lead a normal life again, but Owen's older brother is seeking revenge for his brother's death from Dominique. Thus, the entire gang is determined to take revenge on the man who killed their friend.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Upon discovering his baby photo on a website for missing persons, Nathan discovers that the father and mother he has been living with throughout his youth are not his real parents. He sets out to uncover the truth about his life.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: A DEA agent (Denzel Washington) and a naval intelligence officer (Mark Wahlberg) find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.

programme.title: Automation
programme.desc: When AUTO, a workspace robot, finds out that another advanced model will be taking his place, his fear of destruction drives him to a devastating rampage as he tries to protect his existence, leaving the factory workers scrambling to find safety and put an end to the killing spree.

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: After T’Challa returns to his home in Wakanda to find himself king, he has to team up with CIA agent Everett K. Ross and members of the Wakandan special forces as “Black Panther” to prevent Wakanda from going into a war.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: As Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker are sent to help Palpatine against Count Dooku, Anakin turns more to the Force as he struggles against visions of the death of his beloved wife Padmé, until he is lured to the dark side and Darth Vader is born.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
programme.desc: A seventh installment to the series, with events taking place thirty years after the Battle of Endor and the events portrayed in Return of the Jedi.

programme.title: Furious Seven
programme.desc: Following Owen Shaw and his team, Dominic (Van Diesel), Brian (Paul Walker) and their team can return to the United States and lead a normal life again, but Owen's older brother is seeking revenge for his brother's death from Dominique. Thus, the entire gang is determined to take revenge on the man who killed their friend.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Upon discovering his baby photo on a website for missing persons, Nathan discovers that the father and mother he has been living with throughout his youth are not his real parents. He sets out to uncover the truth about his life.

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
programme.desc: A group of strange beings plan to demolish planet Earth, and Arthur is kicked off it mere seconds before it happens, with the help of his strange friend, Ford. A one-of-its-kind adventure ensues, including a second Earth, and an unhappy robot.

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: Dangerous criminal Richard B. Riddick (Diesel) is being transported to prison in a cargo spacecraft. When the spaceship is damaged by comet debris and makes an emergency crash landing on an empty desert planet, Riddick escapes. However, when predatory alien creatures begin attacking the survivors, Riddick joins forces with the crew to develop a plan to escape the planet.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Five years after the first part, the wanted criminal (Riddick) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself facing the invasion of an empire called Necromongers, the army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: On the run in the year of 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small Californian beach town and is found by Charlie, an 18 year old girl who is trying to find her place in the world. When Charlie revives him, she discovers that this is no ordinary, yellow VW bug.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: After Mr. X steals DM85, a deadly biological weapon, and its antidote, he arranges to sell it to billionaire, Liam Wonder. During their meeting, extreme sports player, Zhao Feng, accidentally parachutes into Bruce and the four rookies room and gets involved with them.

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A gang plans a big heist with a group of corrupt cops, by calling in a 999 dispatch, which is code for “officer down” to lure out a rookie officer, in order for them to pull-off their heist – their plan take unforeseen turns when an unsuspected member has a change of mind.

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: In an apocalyptic world, prisoner Jensen Ames is forced to participate in a car race that is unlike any other. It's a race between armored cars on Terminal Island. In order to win the race, you must brutalize and murder all other competitors. But what if it's merely a trap.

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: In 1985, when a superhero ( the Comedian) die in mysterious circumstances, his colleague (Rorschach) attempts to uncover the circumstances of this crime. Little by little, old comrades meet again in the face of an unknown danger.

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
programme.desc: A group of strange beings plan to demolish planet Earth, and Arthur is kicked off it mere seconds before it happens, with the help of his strange friend, Ford. A one-of-its-kind adventure ensues, including a second Earth, and an unhappy robot.

programme.title: Baahubali: The Beginning
programme.desc: After growing up isolated from the world, Shivudu's adventurous nature leads him out of his homeland. His journey leads him to discover his true origins and the bloody dispute that led to him being raised away from his rightful royal place.(n)

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: After Mr. X steals DM85, a deadly biological weapon, and its antidote, he arranges to sell it to billionaire, Liam Wonder. During their meeting, extreme sports player, Zhao Feng, accidentally parachutes into Bruce and the four rookies room and gets involved with them.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April O'Neil and her wise-cracking cameraman Vernon Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredder's diabolical plan.(n)

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: After twelve arduous labours and the loss of his family, Hercules found solace in bloody battle. Over the years he warmed to the company of six similar souls, as the King of Thrace hires them to train his men to become the greatest army of all time.(n)

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A group of humans who survived a devastating virus that has struck the planet a decade earlier, are at peace with genetically evolved apes led by Caesar. Proven fragile, peace is broken and a war begins between both sects that will determine who will dominate Earth.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
programme.desc: Scott Lang (Paul Rudd) faces the consequences of his choices as a superhero and a father; as he struggles to re-balance his domestic life while assuming his responsibilities as Ant-Man. He’s also confronted by Hope van Dyne (Evangeline Lilly) and Dr. Hank Pym (Michael Douglas) with an urgent new mission.(n)

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: At the end of WWII, the desperate Nazis summon a creature from the depth of Hell to serve as a Nazi weapon. When US forces seize the half-blooded demon, Professor Trevor Bruttenholm takes him in and raises him to be a part of an elite supernatural team that defends the world against forces of evil.(n)

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.(n)

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A film director's plans to shoot his upcoming war movie in the jungle quickly go south when the film crew faces a series of complications, from land mines to local drug lords.(n)

programme.title: Pain & Gain
programme.desc: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida gets caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.(n)

programme.title: الفيلم الوثائقي Marvel's Behind The Mask

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat rescues a wounded man at sea who has lost his memory. He tries to regain it while dodging a group of professional hit-men.

programme.title: The Mexican
programme.desc: Jerry is forced by his mob boss to bring an antique pistol from Mexico into the US, while having to deal with his girlfriend who wants him to quit working for the mob.

programme.title: Colossal
programme.desc: A jobless girl, Gloria, is prompted to leave her life in New York and head back to her hometown. As the news reports announce the emergence of a colossal creature threatening to unleash terrors on the city of Seoul, Gloria gradually realizes that she's mysteriously connected to the creature.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne has a close call with a corrupt C.I.A offical and his group of agents in a new assassination program. At the same time, he looks for answers about his life as a professional hit-man.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: On a sophisticated starship, a new crew embarks on a journey that takes them into a collision with a vengeful Romulan, Nero, who threatens to destroy the Federation and all humankind, one planet at a time. Now James T. Kirk and Spock must leave their rivalry aside as they face off against Nero.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Jason Bourne, a former CIA assassin suffering from psychogenic amnesia, wants to learn more of his past as he is once more enveloped in a conspiracy involving the CIA and Operation Treadstone and forced to continue is past life as an assasin for survival.(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: Bridget Jones is a normal woman who has the average concerns about getting older, putting on weight and advancing in her career. She seems to lack having a man in her life due to her flaws. Things get interesting when playboy Daniel shows interest in her, at the same time that Mark, uptight lawyer, seems to be giving her more attention than usual.(n)

programme.desc: A fishing boat rescues a wounded man at sea who has lost his memory. He tries to regain it while dodging a group of professional hit-men.(n)

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle Of Life
programme.desc: The British Intelligence recruits archaeologist Lara Croft on a mission to get to Pandora's box, which has the most dangerous disease known to mankind. Evil scientist Jonathan has his sights set on the box as well, and Lara Croft agrees to face him on the condition that the Intelligence release the man she is in a relationship with.(n)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: In a force of undead police officers, the Rest in Peace Department, a young slain cop (Ryan Reynolds) teams up with veteran sheriff (Jeff Bridges) to protect the living from roving, monstrous spirits who have not yet crossed over.(n)

programme.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
programme.desc: Mikael Blomkvist is a journalist who is hired by Mr. Vanger in order to reveal the secret of his niece's murder, almost forty years ago,whose body was never found. Thus Blomkvist resorts to young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander to help him reveal the mystery.(n)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.

The Bourne Ultimatum

programme.title: A Fish Called Wanda
programme.desc: A con artist named Wanda devises a plan with three other thieves to steal a diamond worth millions, but things spiral out of control when she tries to double-cross them to have the loot for herself.

programme.title: Father of the Bride
programme.desc: George (Steve Martin) and Nina (Diane Keaton) are the parents of the soon-to-be-wed daughter Annie (Kimberly Williams-Paisley). George isn't yet able to accept the idea that he will let his daughter go, while a series of comic events take place during the preparation for the wedding.

programme.title: Crypto
programme.desc: Following a demotion, a Wall Street banker manages to find clues that unravel a global conspiracy. As he dives into the layers of corruption taking over New York, he soon finds his career, his life, and his family in peril.

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: Inspired by his ex-wife's memoirs, events revolve around the stunning story of the life and achievements of the inspiring physicist Stephen Hawking, despite his motor neurone disease, with a special focus on his relationship with his ex-wife, Jane Wilde.

programme.title: Rust Creek
programme.desc: On her way for a job interview, a college student takes a wrong turn and is stranded in the forest where she has to battle cruel forces and ruthless outlaws before she strikes a deal with a stranger to secure a way out of the woods.

programme.title: The Flood
programme.desc: An immigration officer finds herself in a tight spot as the fate of an asylum seeker lies in her hand, while flashbacks of his journey out of his homeland are portrayed.

programme.title: Father of the Bride Part II
programme.desc: As George struggles to accept his daughter's impending motherhood and what it says about his own role in her life, a rather unexpected dilemma further complicates his life when he discovers that his own wife is pregnant.

programme.title: A Thousand Words
programme.desc: The film revolves within a comedy frame about a skilled literary agent Murphy, trying to reach an oracle to win the authorization to publish his book but the spell backfires and Murphy finds a huge tree has grow in his garden overnight which controls his fate and turns his life upside down.

programme.title: Robin: Watch for Wishes
programme.desc: A man decides to do the impossible for his son Robin when he finds out his incurable disease, as he escapes with him from the hospital and decides to go on an adventure to fulfill all his wishes before the police catch them.

programme.title: The Peanut Butter Falcon
programme.desc: Striving to be a wrestler, Zak, a man with Down Syndrome, escape his care facility to chase his dreams. Fate leads him to Tyler, an outlaw who ends up befriending him and becoming his coach.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge!
programme.desc: As a young writer seeking his fortune in the aftermath of the Bohemian revolution tries to get his play picked up by the owner of the Moulin Rouge, he finds himself involved in a dangerous love affair with star courtesan Satin who is coveted by the wealthy Duke of Monroth.

programme.title: The Cider House Rules
programme.desc: Homer Wells is a young man who was raised in a Maine orphanage, and trained by Dr. Larch to be a physician. As he leaves the orphanage, he sets out on a journey to discover the world around him.

programme.title: Casanova
programme.desc: The story of Casanova, the famous Italian lover of the Renaissance, who loves Francesca despite his engagement to Victoria. Many believe that Casanova is the feminist writer Guardi,who is actually Francesca writing under a pseudonym. Amid all these events, Casanova is accused of heresy.

programme.title: No Strings Attached
programme.desc: Adam and Emma keep crossing ways over the course of fifteen years. Eventually, Emma becomes a doctor, and Adam is trying to fulfill his dream of becoming a writer. After spending a night together, Emma starts to contemplate whether she wants a noncommittal physical relationship, or more than that.

programme.title: What's Love Got to Do with It
programme.desc: The story of Tina Turner's rise to stardom, from her unhappy upbringing, to her meeting her future husband, pop star Ike Turner, to their troubled relationship as Ike grows abusive.

programme.title: The Cider House Rules
programme.desc: Homer Wells is a young man who was raised in a Maine orphanage, and trained by Dr. Larch to be a physician. As he leaves the orphanage, he sets out on a journey to discover the world around him.

programme.title: Father of the Bride Part II
programme.desc: As George struggles to accept his daughter's impending motherhood and what it says about his own role in her life, a rather unexpected dilemma further complicates his life when he discovers that his own wife is pregnant.

programme.title: A Thousand Words
programme.desc: The film revolves within a comedy frame about a skilled literary agent Murphy, trying to reach an oracle to win the authorization to publish his book but the spell backfires and Murphy finds a huge tree has grow in his garden overnight which controls his fate and turns his life upside down.

programme.title: Robin: Watch for Wishes
programme.desc: A man decides to do the impossible for his son Robin when he finds out his incurable disease, as he escapes with him from the hospital and decides to go on an adventure to fulfill all his wishes before the police catch them.

programme.title: The Peanut Butter Falcon
programme.desc: Striving to be a wrestler, Zak, a man with Down Syndrome, escape his care facility to chase his dreams. Fate leads him to Tyler, an outlaw who ends up befriending him and becoming his coach.

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: In South California, Benjamin and his family move to a new house with an adjoining zoo that needs repairs and renovations. With the help of the zoo's employees and some other people, they manage to renovate and open the zoo to the public.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: When her family is threatened by Vladimir Lenin, Anastasia Romanova escapes through a magic portal that takes her to the year 1988, where she becomes friends with an American girl.

programme.title: The Birthday Wish
programme.desc: When Gwen's plans to get engaged on her 30th birthday fall through, she makes a wish to be able to see into the future. But instead of offering answers, her glimpse into the future sends her into a tailspin as it raises questions about whether she is with the right man.

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: As Kevin burgles businessman Max's house, the robbed becomes the robber as Max steals Kevin's lucky ring, urging him to try to get it back to save his career.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Military lawyer Daniel Kaffee(Tom Cruise) is charged with defending two marines accused of killing their colleague. His defense teammate Galloway (Demi Moore) believes they were only following orders from their superior. They unite to prove the truth that the Colonel wants to hide with all his might.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: Frank Abagnale Jr. leaves his family's home at sixteen years old, and relies upon his cheque-forging abilities to make money, making up to two and a half million dollars. During that time, FBI agent Carl Hanratty, is after Frank, who seems to be always one step ahead.

programme.title: Casino
programme.desc: Sam Rothstein, director of a gambling club appointed by the mafia to oversee one of its affiliated clubs in Las Vegas during the 1970s to early 1980s, marries Gingerwhos is pampered, arrogant and malicious. Nicky Santoro, a money collector and an executioner of a Chicago mafia gang, is sent to Las Vegas to make sure the mafia gets its share of money for gambling. Many paradoxes occur there.

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A Houston socialite urges her friend, Congressman Charlie Wilson, to help the Afghan people against Soviet invasion, prompting him to give up his playboy ways and recruit a rebel CIA as he tries to convince the US government to provide funds and help to Afghanistan.

programme.title: Mr. Wonderful
programme.desc: The electrician Gus dreams of having his own bowling-alley, but he can't pay the down payment because of the alimony payments he makes to his ex-wife Leonora. He decides to find potential suitors for her, so that she can get married and he stops paying alimony.

programme.title: Anastasia

programme.desc: A group of men who work at a tower discover that they are victims of a wealthy businessman, and that they are part of a plan to steal the tower.(n)

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: The film follows the huge success painter Margaret Keane had in the 1950s, and her heated divorce from her husband Walter Keane, who fraudulently claimed credit for her works.(n)

programme.title: Rust Creek
programme.desc: On her way for a job interview, a college student takes a wrong turn and is stranded in the forest where she has to battle cruel forces and ruthless outlaws before she strikes a deal with a stranger to secure a way out of the woods.(n)

programme.title: The Count Of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Dantes is falsely accused by his best friend Fernand and is imprisoned in an island prison for 13 years. Dantes escapes and transforms himself into a rich count and dreams of only one revenge.(n)

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: After a drug dealer is convicted and cornered by the DEA in New York, (Montgomery Brogan) re-evaluates his life in the remaining 24 hours before facing a seven-year sentence.(n)

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: Set in the 1930's, New York was considered a hotbed for corruption. Michael Sullivan works as a hit-man for famous kingpin John Rooney. When Rooney threatens Michael's son, Michael decides to get rid of John and show his son what his father does for a living.(n)

programme.title: Blades of Glory
programme.desc: In 2002, Olympic ice skaters, Chazz and Jimmy were stripped of their gold medals and banned from the competition, but they find a loophole in the rules that would allow them to qualify as pairs team and participate together in an attempt to overcome their rivalry.(n)

programme.title: Hell on the Border
programme.desc: The true story of how Bass Reeves beat the odds and a racist community to become the first black deputy marshal west of the Mississippi River, with a career that made history as he distinguished himself in facing off against the outlaws.

programme.title: In the Key of Love
programme.desc: After walking away from her former life to take over her grandmother's wedding photography business, the past comes calling for Maggie when she is hired for the wedding of her ex-boyfriend's sister. It turns out that there is still a spark between the two, just waiting to be reignited.

programme.title: Heartlock
programme.desc: A prison inmate uses his charm to seduce the female guard at his prison in order to use her to break out. But things turn upside down when their forbidden affair leads to tragedy.

programme.title: Love in the Forecast
programme.desc: The life of the weather girl Leah Waddell takes a surprising turn after she decides to make a one year to focus on her career and stop dating. But she finds herself chased by men who want to date her.

programme.title: Same Time, Next Christmas
programme.desc: A young woman tries to be with her childhood sweetheart, whom she met in Hawaii during her family's annual Christmas trip, in spite of the obstacles that keep them apart.

programme.title: Love in Design
programme.desc: With the ratings for her home renovation TV show in decline, Hannah is robbed into returning to her hometown to take on a new job that will take her show in a new restoring a historical manor. Assigned to oversee her work is architect Jeff, who just happens to be her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Now a police inspector, Marcus Burnett teams up with Mike Lowery as they face off against a pair of drug lords, who are, in fact, a mother and a son, all while previous vendettas are chasing them.

programme.title: 2 Hearts
programme.desc: The story of two couples from different times whose lives are intertwined by a special connection that will forever change their fates.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Charlie's Angels always provided their investigative skills to their clients. Now Townsend Agency has highly trained women from around the world who work on the most challenging missions. When a systems engineer reveals information about dangerous technology, the angels must face this threat.

programme.title: What Men Want
programme.desc: A woman’s work in a sports’ agency is underestimated by her fellow male coworkers; she suddenly gets an unexpected advantage over them when she survives an accident and becomes able to hear men’s thoughts.

programme.title: Synchronic
programme.desc: The story follows two New Orleans paramedics whose lives spiral out of control after a designer drug with strange effects causes a series of horrific deaths.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: Cecilia's life turns into a nightmare after a series of strange events befall her, and she starts to suspect that her abusive ex-boyfriend is the culprit. The problem is that her boyfriend seemingly killed himself months ago, and the figure that is haunting her is invisible.

programme.title: The Naked Wanderer
programme.desc: When his girlfriend leaves him, Jake decides to walk Western Australia's coast naked for charitable purposes, in a gesture to win back his sweetheart Jasmine. However, what he finds in the way is a charming woman, Valerie, and he starts questioning his true feelings.

programme.title: Love in Design
programme.desc: With the ratings for her home renovation TV show in decline, Hannah is robbed into returning to her hometown to take on a new job that will take her show in a new restoring a historical manor. Assigned to oversee her work is architect Jeff, who just happens to be her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: The Boy Inside: Trapped By Tourettes
2 Hearts
programme.desc: The story of two couples from different times whose lives are intertwined by a special connection that will forever change their fates.

programme.title: Santa in Training
programme.desc: With a tradition for a new Santa to take over every 30 years, a vengeful elf causes a mix-up during the choosing of the new Santa, causing the candidate to be a Christmas-hating man who is less than willing to let his negative feelings towards the holiday go.

programme.title: A Feeling of Home
programme.desc: When her father has an accident, Abby is forced to drop her current business endeavors and make the trip back to the Texas ranch she calls home. But the trip brings more than Abby bargained for as she reunites with her former boyfriend and falls for him all over again.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Charlie's Angels always provided their investigative skills to their clients. Now Townsend Agency has highly trained women from around the world who work on the most challenging missions. When a systems engineer reveals information about dangerous technology, the angels must face this threat.

programme.title: Sitting in Limbo
programme.desc: After he is wretched living in the UK for 50 years, the Jamaican-born man, Anthony Bryan, struggles during the Windrush scandal to be accepted as a British Citizen, as well as falling victim to the UK Home Office, at which he is considered an illegal immigrant and is threatened of deportation.

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: A small Wisconsin town becomes the center of political attention, when a Democrat strategist named Gary tries to help a retired Marine Colonel run for mayor.

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an unparalleled assassin who is suddenly targeted and pursued by another young operative who can predict his every move. In facing this real life-threat, Henry discovers that this lethal young operative is a 25-year-old clone of himself.

programme.title: Replicas
programme.desc: A daring synthetic biologist, having lost his family in a car accident, will stop at nothing to bring them back, even if it means going up against a government-controlled laboratory and the physical laws of science.

programme.title: Green Book
programme.desc: In 1962, Tony "Tony Lip” (Viggo Mortensen), an Italian-American tough bouncer, is hired to be the driver for the African-American classical pianist Dr. Don Shirley (Mahershala Ali) for a concert tour into the Deep South states. Because of America's racial segregation, Shirley relies on The Negro Motorist Green Book to guide them to small hotels, restaurants and gas stations. As the disparate pair witness and endure America's appalling injustices on the road, they find a newfound respect for each that opens their eyes to the world around them.

programme.title: Heartlock
programme.desc: A prison inmate uses his charm to seduce the female guard at his prison in order to use her to break out. But things turn upside down when their forbidden affair leads to tragedy.

programme.title: Truly, Madly, Sweetly
programme.desc: When a sudden inheritance brings them together, Natalie and Eric connect while renovating the historical bakery they inherited in the hope to kickstart a flourishing business. But despite their obvious feelings, Natalie remains hesitant to change their relationship from professional to romantic.

programme.title: The Boy Inside: Trapped By Tourettes
Sitting in Limbo
programme.desc: After he is wretched living in the UK for 50 years, the Jamaican-born man, Anthony Bryan, struggles during the Windrush scandal to be accepted as a British Citizen, as well as falling victim to the UK Home Office, at which he is considered an illegal immigrant and is threatened of deportation.

Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.(n)

programme.title: The Iron Mask
programme.desc: When the English traveler Jonathan Green receives an order to map the Russian Far East from Peter the Great, he goes yet on another adventure full of ups and downs that will eventually lead him to China, where he will face many unexpected encounters.(n)

programme.title: Gemini Man

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to Wonderland through a mirror, and goes on a quest to save the Mad Hatter’s life, by rescuing his family from their doomed fate – she steals the Chronosphere form Time, to travel back in time, but that would lead Wonderland to parish.(n)

programme.title: After The Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.(n)

programme.title: Black Widow
programme.desc: Set after the Avengers' Civil War but before the war with Thanos, Natasha Romanoff goes on a new mission in Russia, which stirs up her past with the KGB, her training by the Red Room, and her journey to becoming the hero known as the Black Widow.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.(n)

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.(n)

programme.title: Captive State
programme.desc: With Chicago falling under alien rule for a decade, the human residents chafe at the impoverished neighborhoods they have to live in as an underground resistance group plots to attack.(n)

programme.title: Abducted
programme.desc: Dane is a military vet who finds himself on the hunt for the people who kidnapped his young daughter after a home invasion. As the authorities investigate the crime, Dane conducts his own investigation in a desperate race against the clock to save his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Killer Competition
programme.desc: High school senior Nicole fudges test grades in order to become valedictorian. But things take a horrifying turn, as some students get murdered, and she becomes the main suspect.(n)

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Trapped in a retirement home, a group of former veterans seeks to put their skills to use to break out of their unwanted place of retirement, hoping to achieve the unrealized dreams that each of them still has.(n)

programme.title: After The Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.(n)

programme.title: Lovecraft Country
programme.desc: What started out as a road trip to find Atticus' missing father, turns into a journey across the segregated 1950s United States, where Atticus uncovers dark secrets and supernatural phenomenons.

programme.title: Vinyl
programme.desc: As the music scene in the 70s expands to include new genres, a struggling record executive tries to survive and rediscover his passion for music as he is forced to face the consequences of past actions and the casualties he left behind on the quest for success.

programme.title: The Wire S1
programme.desc: A look into the Baltimore drug scene from both sides, the drug dealers and the law enforcement team tasked with bringing them down, through the story of a detective who leads a joint homicide and narcotics team in the pursuit of drug lord Avon Barksdale.

programme.title: Chicago Med S6
programme.desc: In the sixth season, the staff at Gaffney Chicago Medical Center deals with the aftermath of the global pandemic, while saving patients’ lives and grappling with their own personal problems.

programme.title: L.A.'s Finest S2
programme.desc: Jen's death leaves LAPD detectives Syd Burnett and Nancy McKenna going after her killer, while the entire LAPD team works around the clock to put an end to a powerful crime wave in Koreatown.

programme.title: The Flash S7
programme.desc: In the seventh season, Barry tries to find his missing wife Iris, while Team Flash carries on their battle against Eva McCulloch as they manage to create another Speed Force.

programme.title: Beecham House
programme.desc: A look into the lives of a group of people living in a large mansion in Delhi, in a work that shows the life in 19th century India before the British Crown rule.

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: The story revolves around Olive, who lives in a New England town, where crime and illegal acts are rampant. She recounts her life with her husband, Henry, who works as a pharmacistst and their son Christopher, who despises her parenting style and the system of the community around him.

programme.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting

programme.title: All Yours

programme.title: Official Secrets
programme.desc: In the run-up to the invasion of Iraq, British Intelligence whistle-blower Katharine Gun leaked a memo about a joint spying between the US and UK, proposing to blackmail smaller member states to vote for the war in Iraq. Journalist Martin Bright published that document in The Observer newspaper and the Security Council was outraged.

programme.title: Deadly Assistant
programme.desc: Amanda is left reeling from the sudden death of her sister Lauren. When she grows to suspect foul play in her death, she is shocked when evidence points to Lauren's own son, Charlie, sending Amanda on a journey to search for the truth about her sister's family.

programme.title: Where'd You Go, Bernadette
programme.desc: When Bee a 15 year-old's mother disappears,she sets out to find where she is, while discovering her troubled past in the process.

programme.title: The Children Act
programme.desc: A renowned High Court Judge deals with a personal crisis just as she has to rule on one of the hardest cases of her life. Her ruling is what determines whether an underage leukemia patient can refuse a life-saving blood transfusion for religious reasons or not.

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: When a politician crosses paths with a ballerina, he becomes smitten, the thing that brings about the wrath of the agents of Fate as they try to keep the couple apart. The man then tries to pass through traceable doors so he makes an outage while holding his beloved's hands.

programme.title: The Handmaid's Tale
programme.desc: In a dystopian future where criminals are put in sexual bondage, Kate is made a concubine for the privileged and forced to bear children to the man she is assigned to.

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: When the 26-year-old Caleb, a coder working in the world's largest internet company, is chosen to take part in an experiment in which he has to interact with the world's smartest humanoid, created using A.I., he's in for more than he has anticipated.

programme.title: Blindspotting
programme.desc: With only three days left of his probation, Collin is looking forward to starting anew and finding a new job, but his best friend Miles causes some problems and obstacles that endanger their friendship.
