programme.title: How To Lose A Guy In 10 Days
programme.desc: Journalist Andie Anderson specializes in writing topics of interest to women, but she wants to write about other things. She makes a deal with her boss that she would be free to write what she wants if she can write an article about what girls do wrong to spoil their relationship with guys.

programme.title: Grace Of Monaco
programme.desc: The biopic of Hollywood starlet Grace Kelly, who married Prince Rainier III of Monaco in April 1956. The film tracks a particularly trying time, during a political dispute in the 1960s between Rainier and French President Charles De Gaulle.

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: Rock star Ricki (Meryl Streep), gave up everything for her dream of rock-and-roll stardom, is now returning home to make things right with her family.

programme.title: Finding Love in Mountain View
programme.desc: Margaret is shocked when the news of her estranged cousin's death comes with the reveal that her cousin has picked her as her children's custodian. As she moves to Moutain View to look after the children, the move heralds the start of a new chapter in her life.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: When a brilliant anthropologist who has been living among the gorillas in Africa is caught after killing some poachers, an up-and-coming psychiatrist tries to uncover the truth of what happened, how the anthropogist disappeared in Africa, and the cause of his violent outbrust.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: A former gateway driver for a gang is enrolled in Witness Protection. When he gives his guard the slip in order to drive his girlfriend to an interview in LA, their field trip gets more complicated as they are pursued by a former acquaintance and a US Marshall.

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: With her life in shambles, Cheryl seeks a way out of her downward spiral by going on a solo hike on a journey of self-discovery and reevaluation of priorities.

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: Inman meets Ada in Cold Mountain,where they fall in love. He gets assigned military duty to serve during the Civil War, changing their lives completely. Ada struggles with hardship and hunger, and he fights for his life everyday. She writes to him, asking him to come back to her, and he decides to leave the military and makes his way back on a journey more difficult than they imagined.

programme.title: A Model Kidnapping
programme.desc: When the aspiring model Grace goes to a photoshoot for the fashion photographer Hunter, things take a terrifying turn when she finds herself kidnapped, as she has to find a way to free herself from his clutches.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: A former gateway driver for a gang is enrolled in Witness Protection. When he gives his guard the slip in order to drive his girlfriend to an interview in LA, their field trip gets more complicated as they are pursued by a former acquaintance and a US Marshall.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: When a brilliant anthropologist who has been living among the gorillas in Africa is caught after killing some poachers, an up-and-coming psychiatrist tries to uncover the truth of what happened, how the anthropogist disappeared in Africa, and the cause of his violent outbrust.

programme.title: Grace of Monaco
programme.desc: The biopic of Hollywood starlet Grace Kelly, who married Prince Rainier III of Monaco in April 1956. The film tracks a particularly trying time, during a political dispute in the 1960s between Rainier and French President Charles De Gaulle.(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: Rock star Ricki (Meryl Streep), gave up everything for her dream of rock-and-roll stardom, is now returning home to make things right with her family.(n)

programme.title: Finding Love in Mountain View
programme.desc: Margaret is shocked when the news of her estranged cousin's death comes with the reveal that her cousin has picked her as her children's custodian. As she moves to Moutain View to look after the children, the move heralds the start of a new chapter in her life.(n)

programme.title: Instinct

programme.title: The Good Lie
programme.desc: Orphaned by the brutal Civil war in Sudan that began in 1983, these young victims traveled as many as a thousand miles on foot in search of safety. Fifteen years later, a humanitarian effort would bring 3600 lost boys and girls to America.(n)

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, who was working in the attorney general's office, decides to quit her job to work as a counselor in marital affairs and a psychiatrist.(n)

programme.title: The Other Wife
programme.desc: Kate's life falls apart when she learns that her husband has been leading a double life. Things get even worse when a mysterious killer goes after her for the money her late husband has stolen from him.(n)

programme.title: Wendy
programme.desc: As Wendy ends up on a mysterious island where children can not grow old, the joy that hangs around the ever-youthful children begins to sour when an accident turns Wendy's brother resentful, threatening to change the very nature of the island and the everlasting youth it grants.(n)

programme.title: The Happening
programme.desc: Science teacher Elliot Moore notices the sudden disappearance of bees, and research scientists are unable to pinpoint the reason for this. Eventually, a horrible plague threatens Earth, causing bizarre behavior among the citizens at Central Park.(n)

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: After Dr. Louis Creed moves with his family to a small town in Maine, he comes across an ancient burial site near their home, as he discovers it has the ability to bring back the dead.(n)

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: A group of young adults discover a camping area by Crystal Lake, known to be a spot where tragedies have taken place before. Unfortunately, they run into the vengeful Jason Voorhees, who will stop at nothing to end their lives.(n)

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A high school senior, who's treated as an outcast by her classmates, lives with her religious fanatic mother who wants to isolate her from the world. When Carrie finds out that she posses telekinetic powers, she unleashes her anger on all those who did her wrong.(n)

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: When Secret Service Agent Pete Garrison becomes the victim of a plot that frames him for an assassination attempt on the president, he finds himself working outside the law to prove his innocence, while trying to evade one of his own mentees who is trying to arrest him.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Marcus Burnett (Martin Lawrence), the quite family man and Mike Lowrey (Will Smith), the reckless ladies man are Miami policemen who are assigned to recover a $100 million drugug shipment before it gets distributed and they have only 72 hours to do it.

programme.desc: Katniss finds herself in District 13 after she literally shatters the game forever, faced with a decision that could sway the fate of her nation. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss reluctantly becomes the symbol of mass revolution against the autocratic Capitol.

programme.title: Alita: Battle Angel
programme.desc: In a dystopian future, a scientist reactivates a cyborg with a human brain, whom he believes will be crucial in making their world better. He names her Alita, and tries to help her as she struggles to find her own identity and unlock her abilities in light of her lost memories.

programme.title: Battle for Incheon: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: The story follows the daring covert operation 'X-ray' where a team of spies is sent by American General Douglas MacArthur to gather intelligence on North Korean defenses before the launch of the Incheon Landing Operation.

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: William is a brave squire, whose master dies, and he decides to continue his legacy with his friends, Roland and Watt, by his side. programme.desc: James Franco invited many of his friends to attend his housewarming party in LA including Jonah Hill, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel, Craig Robinson, Michael Cera and others. Suddenly, during the party, the Biblical Apocalypse begins. They hide inside the house and try to survive the end of the world.

programme.title: Burlesque
programme.desc: In a struggling burlesque club that is teetering on the edge of closing, the owner, Tess, finds a possible saving grace in the arrival of Ali, a small-town girl who possesses a tremendous talent that she soon becomes the club's main attraction.

programme.title: A Happening of Monumental Proportions
programme.desc: Over the course of Career Day at an elementary school, the lives of a number of students, parents, and teachers intersect, as some teachers desperately try to hide the body of the school's dead gardener from everyone present.

programme.title: London
programme.desc: In an attempt to win back his ex-girlfriend, Syd crashes the going-away party her friends are throwing her. As he stops to buy cocaine and takes his dealer with him to the party, they lock themselves in the bathroom where their drug-fueled conversation prompts Syd to talk to his ex.

programme.title: The Remains
programme.desc: An unsuspecting family moves to an old Victorian home, unaware that a chest in their attic has antiques possessed by an evil spirit that soon possesses each family member as it grows stronger and nearly achieves its malevolent to kidnap the children.

programme.title: The Aftermath
programme.desc: In post WWII Germany; Rachel Morgan reunites with her husband, Louis, a British Colonel assigned to Hamburg during the reconstruction. Life gets uneasy and turbulent when he decides to share the house with its former owners; a German widow and her disturbed daughter.

programme.title: Can You Keep a Secret?
programme.desc: Fearing a plane crash, the drunk Emma confesses her deepest secrets to the man sitting next to her who turns out to be her company's CEO. As love blossoms between them, Emma struggles with their uneven relationship born out of him knowing everything about her, and her knowing nothing about him.

programme.title: London
programme.desc: In an attempt to win back his ex-girlfriend, Syd crashes the going-away party her friends are throwing her.
